mapper.update: update events_statements_histogram_global set BUCKET_TIMER_LOW = #{BUCKET_TIMER_LOW,jdbcType=BIGINT}, BUCKET_TIMER_HIGH = #{BUCKET_TIMER_HIGH,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COUNT_BUCKET = #{COUNT_BUCKET,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COUNT_BUCKET_AND_LOWER = #{COUNT_BUCKET_AND_LOWER,jdbcType=BIGINT}, BUCKET_QUANTILE = #{BUCKET_QUANTILE,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where BUCKET_NUMBER = #{BUCKET_NUMBER,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select BUCKET_NUMBER, BUCKET_TIMER_LOW, BUCKET_TIMER_HIGH, COUNT_BUCKET, COUNT_BUCKET_AND_LOWER, BUCKET_QUANTILE from events_statements_histogram_global where BUCKET_NUMBER = #{BUCKET_NUMBER,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select BUCKET_NUMBER, BUCKET_TIMER_LOW, BUCKET_TIMER_HIGH, COUNT_BUCKET, COUNT_BUCKET_AND_LOWER, BUCKET_QUANTILE from events_statements_histogram_global
